summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3760 for the improvement of the alley in Block 24, Brooklyn Addition, from East 40th Street to East 41st Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 46242, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
